Texto: 
slight crepitus with left hip motion
none
ap radiograph of the left hip demonstrates a lucent lesion in the proximal left femoral metaphysis.  the lesion is medullay centric and is surrounded by a thick rim of sclerosis.  the lesion is non-aggressive in appearance.
fibrous dysplasia of the hip
fibrous dysplasia
infection
eg
solitary bone cyst
intermittent left hip pain
